about_the_game:
Lostria is a competitive turn-based game set in the fantasy universe of the same name.

Beta version

The game is still in development and we plan to complete it before the end of the year. In the meantime yon can alredy play on the beta and playtest versions!

Gameplay

Build your team and compete against other players in Ranked or Friendly matches. Get rewards, unlock new characters and build even more specialized teams to lead you to victory.

For the more creative ones, the map editor is at your disposal, show your artist and level designer skills to your friends.

Come challenge players around the world and try to become the best strategist!

  • Processor: Dual core Intel- AMD 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
